data.description: Parses vCard RFC2426 and vCal RFC2445 files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
After several rounds of discussion on Perl Module authors and with
    several collegues we have decided that the Text:: name space is the
    best place for not only the general parser but also for the
    resulting objects it will create.

    We considered Business::, Data::, and Net:: - however the fit is
    significantly better with Text::.

    We will be registering Text::vCard and Text::vCalendar shortly.
